parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

datasetStructure: One record per protocol deviation per subject

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.STUDYID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DOMAIN

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.USUBJID

datasetVariables.description: Identifier used to uniquely identify a subject across all studies for all applications or submissions involving the product.
datasetVariables.label: Unique Subject Identifier
datasetVariables.name: USUBJID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVSEQ

datasetVariables.description: Sequence Number given to ensure uniqueness of subject records within a domain. May be any valid number.
datasetVariables.label: Sequence Number
datasetVariables.name: DVSEQ

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVREFID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVSPID

datasetVariables.description: Sponsor-defined reference number. Perhaps pre-printed on the CRF as an explicit line identifier or defined in the sponsor's operational database. Example: Line number on a CRF page.
datasetVariables.label: Sponsor-Defined Identifier
datasetVariables.name: DVSPID

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVTERM

datasetVariables.description: Verbatim name of the protocol deviation criterion. Example: IVRS PROCESS DEVIATION - NO DOSE CALL PERFORMED. The DVTERM values will map to the controlled terminology in DVDECOD, such as TREATMENT DEVIATION.
datasetVariables.label: Protocol Deviation Term
datasetVariables.name: DVTERM

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVDECOD

datasetVariables.description: Controlled terminology for the name of the protocol deviation. Examples: SUBJECT NOT WITHDRAWN AS PER PROTOCOL, SELECTION CRITERIA NOT MET, EXCLUDED CONCOMITANT MEDICATION, TREATMENT DEVIATION.
datasetVariables.label: Protocol Deviation Coded Term
datasetVariables.name: DVDECOD

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVCAT

datasetVariables.description: Category of the protocol deviation criterion.
datasetVariables.label: Category for Protocol Deviation
datasetVariables.name: DVCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVSCAT

datasetVariables.description: A further categorization of the protocol deviation.
datasetVariables.label: Subcategory for Protocol Deviation
datasetVariables.name: DVSCAT

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.EPOCH

datasetVariables.description: Epoch associated with the start date/time of the deviation. Examples: TREATMENT PHASE, SCREENING, and FOLLOW-UP.
datasetVariables.label: Epoch
datasetVariables.name: EPOCH

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVSTDTC

datasetVariables.description: Start date/time of deviation represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: Start Date/Time of Deviation
datasetVariables.name: DVSTDTC

parentProduct.title: Study Data Tabulation Model Implementation Guide: Human Clinical Trials Version 3.1.3 (Final)

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for SDTMIG variable DV.DVENDTC

datasetVariables.description: End date/time of deviation represented in ISO 8601 character format.
datasetVariables.label: End Date/Time of Deviation
datasetVariables.name: DVENDTC

description: An events domain that contains protocol violations and deviations during the course of the study. (Source: CDISC Controlled Terminology, DOMAIN, C49585, 2018-06-29)
label: Protocol Deviations
name: DV
